TopicTitle: did anyone else notice that 3 minute slog?

Articles.Content:
I've been keeping a monitor on kerbalspaceprogram.com's latency and it just jumped up to 20 seconds for like three minutes.

Big things are brewing. They might have just release some kind of patch or who knows what. Or maybe I'm just obsessed.

I'm at work so I can't test the program to see if it's going to update itself. anyone else care to join me in wild speculation?

I think you are jumping to conclusions nhnifong, and could get people overexcited over nothing, there are a lot of reasons why the site is slow, not least of which might be your own ISP.

Kerbalspaceprogram.com has been fine for me.

I think to prevent any unwarranted speculation, this thread had better be closed, sorry nhnifong.
That jump up was for a reason, and it was tied to some back end with the web server that was because of a change of where we locate attachments.
